acceptSubmission(uint256,uint256).details: Accepts a HunterSubmission and sets the BountyItem state to Closed.

checkStopContract().details: Enables contract emergency stop / circuit breaker. Only callable by contract owner.
checkStopContract().return: isStopped           Returns boolean value of isStopped when contract owner providing the ownner status.

createBounty(string,string,uint256).details: Creates a new BountyItem to which users can submit HunterSubmission solutions.

params._bountyAmount: Bounty award amount for a new BountyItem.

createBounty(string,string,uint256).return: boolean             Returns true if function is executes successfully.

createSubmission(uint256,string).details: Creates and submits a HunterSubmission for a BountyItem to be reviewed by the Bounty Poster.
createSubmission(uint256,string).return: boolean             Returns true if function is executes successfully.

fetchBounty(uint256).details: Fetches the details of a BountyItem.
fetchBounty(uint256).return: bountyPoster        Address of the BountyItem poster.title               Title of the BountyItem.description         Description of the BountyItem.amount              Bounty award amount of the BountyItem.state               Current state (BountyState type) of the BountyItem.submissionCount     Number of HunterSubmissions for the BountyItem.

fetchSubmission(uint256,uint256).details: Fetches the details for a HunterSubmission solution of a BountyItem.
fetchSubmission(uint256,uint256).return: bountyId            Returns ID/mapping key of the BountyItem.submissionId        Returns ID/mapping key of the HunterSubmission.hunter              Returns hunter address of the HunterSubmission.body                Returns body of text for the HunterSubmission.status              Returns current status (SubmissionStatus type) of the HunterSubmission.

rejectSubmission(uint256,uint256).return: boolean             Returns true if function is executes successfully.

resumeContract().details: Disables contract emergency stop / circuit breaker. Only callable by contract owner.
resumeContract().return: isStopped           Returns boolean value of isStopped if resumeContract executes successfully.

stopContract().details: Enables contract emergency stop / circuit breaker. Only callable by contract owner.
stopContract().return: isStopped           Returns boolean value of isStopped if stopContract executes successfully.
